text.section: In this part the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Business" does not include a farm operation.

text.section:
"Displaced", with respect to a person, means moving from real property, or moving the person's personal property from real property:
wholly or partly as a result of the Commission's acquisition of the real property; or
as the result of a written order of the Commission to vacate the real property for a public works program or project the Commission undertakes.

"Farm operation" means an activity that:
is conducted primarily for the production of one or more agricultural products, including timber, for sale or home use; and
customarily produces those products in sufficient quantity to be able to contribute materially to the operator's income.
"Relocation payment" means a payment the Commission makes to a displaced person in accordance with this part.
